attributes.action: NO Confidence Vote in The FA/FL and PL.  Fans Ask For Proper Government Regulation
attributes.additional_details:
We the fans ask that the government puts into force the recommendation from the Enquiry into Governance of Professional Football.

We the fans no long have confidence that the FA/PL and FL are Fit and Proper to regulate our national sport.

We the fans ask the government to reform the FA/FL and PL so it is fit for purpose.

We the fans support community ownership based on the German 50+1 model.

We the fans ask that owners who are not fit for purpose be removed from owning OUR clubs.
